alert.note: Alert for Collin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 13 at 9:27AM CST until December 13 at 9:45AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CST FOR CENTRAL COLLIN COUNTY... At 925 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near McKinney, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... McKinney around 930 AM CST. Fairview around 935 AM CST. Lowry Crossing around 940 AM CST. Princeton and Melissa around 945 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include New Hope and Weston. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
